fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry
eu_initiatives: leagal framework, legislation for social economy - taxation, local partnership
organisation_name: Association Social economy Slovenia, social enterprise (ASES)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Nwteork Social economy South east Europe - in forming
goals__remit: We wish to serve as a platform for connection of social enterprises and those supporting institutions which have set themselves a goal to promote social entrepreneurship and thereby become a generator of sustainably oriented socio-economical changes in Slovenia. Furthermore, we intend to act as an internationally branched out and renowned centre of excellence for development and promotion of social entrepreneurship.
